name: Android-blue-display
tagline: The App receives basic draw and GUI requests from Arduino etc. over Bluetooth (HC-05) and renders it. It also sends touch events over Bluetooth back to Arduino.
body:
### Welcome to BlueDisplay.
The App is available on [PlayStore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.joachimsmeyer.android.bluedisplay).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
